subject: JMUnit 1.0 Final Version Released
msgSnippet: The JMUnit 1.0 Final Version was released yesterday, in http://sourceforge.net/projects/jmunit/. It s beta version was available for donwloads several weeks
messageBody:
The JMUnit 1.0 Final Version was released yesterday, in http://sourceforge.net/projects/jmunit/. It's beta version was available for donwloads several weeks ago. There was few modifications in the final version, most of the effort was in the full documentation of the source-code. The project now is targeting in it's divulgation in the developer community of Java ME and the creation of the 1.1 version, with many improvements and some features to Java ME. The JMUnit is totally based in the xUnit, been a library for unit testing similar to JUnit, but for Java Micro Edition. It main advantages are simplicity, been easy to use and a library that really helps the mobile application developers. It has two versions, one for each version of the CLDC, and it's open-source. It's the first of a some of possible open-source projects with the purpose of get better the job of the programmers in that plataform. In the future, maybe, you'll receive more news about them.
